subject: Re: [PATCH v5 1/1] NFSD: Enforce timeout on layout recall and integrate lease manager fencing

reviews.author: Christoph Hellwig
reviews.summary: Reviewer Christoph Hellwig suggested splitting the patch into two separate patches, one for core infrastructure and another for NFS daemon (nfsd) code.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Reviewer Jeff Layton raised concerns about the handling of lease removal after fencing, questioning whether the layout stateid's refcount will go to zero and suggesting that the lease should be unlocked as soon as fencing is done.

reviews.author: Dai Ngo (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Dai Ngo clarified the behavior of the fence worker and its impact on layout stateid reference counting, and suggested separating the patch into two patches for core infrastructure and nfsd in a previous version.
